welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sweetwater, where the charm of small town America meets the excitement of the Wild West. You'll fall in love with our friendly community, delicious local cuisine, and endless outdoor adventures. We invite you to explore and make unforgettable memories while visiting our beautiful city."

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Miami International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Miami International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Miami International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at North Perry Airport is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport, serving both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale–Hollywood International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Fort Lauderdale–Hollywood International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Fort Lauderdale–Hollywood International Airport, serving international flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 4 hours of free access per day.
